hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities

Class BaseActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • hu.vadasz.peter.knockmessenger.Activities.BaseActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseActivityWithKnockDecoder, BrowseFriendsActivity, CodesActivity, CodeSettingActivity, FriendsActivity, KnockGraphActivity, MainScreenActivity, MainSettingsActivity, PermissionDeniedActivity, ProfileActivity, SplashActivity

    public abstract class BaseActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    Class to collect common methods of activities and manage dependency injection.
